Moncef Dhouib (Arabic) (a mụrụ n'afọ 1952 na Sfax) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Tunisian, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'ede ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na nwa bebi
Ọ bụ onye natara onyinye FESPACO
Mgbe o mechara ihe nkiri mkpirikpi anọ a ma ama n'afọ ndi 1980', o mere The Sultan of the City (Soltane El Medina) (1993) na The TV arrives (Talfaza Jaya) (2006).
